Once upon a time, in a sky painted with azure hues, there lived a fluffy cloud named Cumulus. Unlike other clouds, Cumulus had a peculiar fear: he was terrified of heights. While his friends floated blissfully above, he hovered low, afraid of the dizzying drop below. One day, a storm approached, and Cumulus knew he had to help. With a deep breath, he rose higher, discovering a breathtaking view of the world. As he gathered raindrops to nourish the earth, he realized heights werenâ€™t so frightening after all. From that day forward, Cumulus embraced the sky, inspiring others to conquer their fears.
